type.name: org.gradle.language.assembler.tasks.Assemble
type.description: Translates Assembly language source files into object files.

method.name: getAssemblerArgs
method.description: Additional arguments to provide to the assembler.

method.name: getToolChain
method.description: The tool chain being used to build.

method.name: getObjectFileDir
method.description: The directory where object files will be generated.

method.name: source
method.description: Adds a set of assembler sources files to be translated. The provided sourceFiles object is evaluated as per org.gradle.api.Project#files(Object...).

property.name: assemblerArgs
property.description: Additional arguments to provide to the assembler.

property.name: objectFileDir
property.description: The directory where object files will be generated.

property.name: toolChain
property.description: The tool chain being used to build.
